phase.name: Video and 3D Model Support
phase.goal: Extend media support to include videos on screens/projectors and 3D models as objects in the room.

in.item: Medium field (projector, display, frame, wallpaper, 3D model) influences rendering

out.item: No advanced media controls (e.g. playlists, subtitles) in MVP

backend.item: Extend /upload and asset handling to accept video and 3D model files.
Integrate ffmpeg for transcoding videos to a web-friendly format (e.g. H.264 MP4).

frontend.item: Extend upload dialog to detect file type and set Asset.type (image, video, model3d) and medium.
Render video assets as planes with video textures (projector/display behavior).
Load 3D models via useGLTF and place them as Meshes in the scene.

successCriteria.item: A curator can upload a video and see it playing on a virtual screen or projected surface.
A curator can upload a 3D model and place it as a sculpture in the room.
